last_chance: LAST CHANCE TO BUY! PRESALE ENDING IN:
multi_chain_text: Spawned from a mystical bamboo forest, Zen the Panda was born with the unique ability to climb through portals in the crypto universe. His meditative mastery across Ethereum and Solana transformed the panda into a symbol of wisdom and unity, giving rise to the Zenverse. Now, Zen has discovered a way to share his chain-climbing ability so that $ZEN holders can freely traverse the best crypto chains. What a wise master.
multichain_description: Zen The Panda is the first Panda Meme token built on a multichain network spanning Ethereum, BNB Chain, Polygon, Solana, Avalanche, and Base. Welcome to an interconnected sanctuary of meme enthusiasts where community, rewards, and creative joy converge. Stake your $ZEN tokens on Ethereum to earn passive rewards and grow your holdings throughout meme season.
launching_on_chains_text: Zen endeavors to unite the crypto meme community and stand as the vanguard of multichain utility. As the first Panda Meme to be launched on six different blockchains, Zen’s only wish is to see his name up in lights on every DEX, every CEX, and every place where meme deigns congregate. With a knack for celestial convergence, Zen brings a multichain dimension to the meaning of trending on DEXTools.
multi_bridge_text_1: Zen is the meditating panda master, the first meme coin to grace the six most active blockchains outside of Bitcoin.
multi_bridge_text_2: The $ZEN token will be launched on Ethereum, BNB Chain, Polygon, Solana, Avalanche, and Base.
multi_bridge_text_3: Utilizing superior bridging technology, $ZEN will be seamlessly multichain in just a few clicks, with minuscule gas fees to worry about. Zen is bringing tranquility to the multichain universe!
token_heading: ZEN THE PANDA HAS A TOTAL SUPPLY OF 200,000,000,000 TOKENS
token_description: The $ZEN token is minted on Ethereum and is unique in that it can also be claimed, stored and traded on Solana, BNB Chain, Base, Polygon, or Avalanche using Wormhole and Portal Bridge tech.
step_1_description: Locate the presale widget at the top of this webpage and link your preferred wallet. There are several options available to you.
step_2_description: Once linked, you can engage in the presale on Ethereum, Solana, BNB Chain, Polygon, Avalanche, or Base. Our platform is multichain-enabled right from the outset!
step_3_description: Specify the amount of ETH, SOL, BNB, MATIC, AVAX, USDT, or USDC you wish to exchange for $ZEN and validate the transaction in your wallet.
step_4_description: After the presale concludes, you can retrieve your $ZEN tokens using the same wallet and chain used for purchase.
step_5_description: $ZEN will be exchangeable on all major chains and DEXs. Simply utilize the Zen Bridge for effortless token transition between chains.
faq_answer_1: Zen The Panda is the first multichain meme coin, this meditating master is bringing $ZEN to all the biggest blockchains.
faq_question_2: How do I participate in the presale?
faq_answer_2: You can take part in the presale on Ethereum, Polygon or BNB Chain. All you need to do is connect your Best Wallet or other wallet to the presale widget above and use ETH, BNB, MATIC, AVAX, SOL or USDT to reserve $ZEN tokens.
faq_question_3: When do I receive my presale tokens?
faq_answer_3: Once you’ve completed your presale purchase, you’ll be able to use the same wallet to claim your tokens before the first DEX listing. Claim and listing dates will be announced on our social media accounts.
faq_answer_4: Staking is the action of sending your tokens to a smart contract and locking them for a defined period of time. This will earn you more $ZEN tokens over time at a dynamic rate. Zen staking is only available on the Ethereum network for now. For more information, click on 'Staking' in the navigation bar.
faq_question_5: Is there a way to contact support?
faq_answer_5: We’re here to help! Kindly join our Telegram channel to find prompt support from a Zen The Panda moderator. You could also email contact@zenthepanda.com and await a response.
faq_question_6: How do I know the presale is secure?
faq_answer_6: The presale smart contracts have been created on the back of Web3Payments technology, which is powered by Web3Toolkit. By using their tried and tested smart contract technology, we can be sure that the purchase information for presale buyers is stored safely on chain.

contract_gets_written: The distribution of Zen The Panda token rewards will occur at a rate of 6088 $ZEN per Ethereum (ETH) block and will be disbursed over 2 years.
staking_rewards_info: Zen The Panda staking rewards are distributed at a rate of 6088 $ZEN per ETH block. Your percentage of the pool will determine what percentage of the 6088 $ZEN tokens you receive.
